about_the_game:
Salus per aquam is a metaphysical adventure set in a mysterious world that blends reality and dream.

Your goal is to reach the highest point of the protagonist's existence: a wooden mannequin with a strange mask on its face.
You will climb surreal objects in metaphysical landscapes, where each jump is crucial to avoid losing your climbing progress.

This journey is open to interpretation, allowing each player to discover a personal meaning and embark on a journey of self-discovery.

Key features:
  • Climbing mechanics: Experience an oniric climbing game where precise movements and careful jumps are essential to progress.
  • Surreal environments: Explore enigmatic landscapes that challenge your perception.
  • Metaphysical themes: Immerse yourself in a silent narrative that encourages personal interpretation.
  • Original soundtrack

Salus per aquam is tailored to the artistic tastes and skills of its sole developer, who presents this title as their first work.

DISCLAIMER: This game was developed by a solo developer and, not having a team, the assets used to build the levels and mechanics are not entirely custom-made. However, each asset used was carefully chosen to create the specific scenarios of the title, and no asset was used without purpose or due to a lack of ideas.
